reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits beautifully, hitting right around the ankles, and appreciate its comfort, with one noting the stretchy band makes it very comfy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars As pictured
items.body: Loved this dress, it was perfect for family photos. Loose, flowy, good quality and true to size. Ordered a small, fit like a small. Was hoping color would be a little more tan, felt like it was more cream but still pretty. Read more
items.author: Wells Family

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Summer Dress
items.body: This dress is so cute and comfortable! I bought in black and the brown color. It feels comfortable and has a slip underneath so itâ€™s not see-through. I have a large chest and the cut is flattering without being revealing. I also love the length (Iâ€™m 5â€™10) and the dress can be worn with flats or a little heel. Read more
items.author: Natalya Wade

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Last-Minute Find!
items.body: Bought this dress in a pinch after my life-of-the-party husband committed us to a 4th of July bash ðŸ¥´ and I had nothing festive or flattering to wear. This dress totally saved me! Itâ€™s lightweight, breezy, and the medium fits just right on my 5 ft, 137 lb frame. The length barely kisses the floor, and Iâ€™ll be wearing a slight wedge to give it that perfect floaty look. Havenâ€™t worn it yet, but I already know itâ€™s a winâ€”and now that I have the perfect outfit, I donâ€™t even have an excuse to bow out! ðŸ˜… Read more
items.author: e

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sun dress
items.body: This is such a pretty sundress! It's true to size, the color is perfect, material is breathable can be worn dressy and laid back, just know the buttons are for show only you can't unbutton. Read more
items.author: Kat

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Maxi Dress
items.body: Fit as expected- colour faded after a couple washes to a slightly lighter shade but itâ€™s still lovely. Perfect for a sunny, breezy afternoon outing. Sturdy construction and properly lined so not see through! Read more
items.author: Kerri Knight

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Size L & XL comparison
items.body: I bought two sizes as I've been losing weight and wasn't sure which to buy. I am 5'8", 192 pounds and maybe a 42B?? I don't know. I need to get some bras that fit me. :) OVERALL FIT: The XL Orange Dress fits fine, but if I lose any more, it will probably drop on my waist a tad, maybe almost hang on my hips but not quite. The Large Blue Dress is more my size, but only because I do not have big boobs. BREAST ROOM: You can see in the XL Orange Dress that it would give more room for larger breasts. The Large Blue Dress does not have room to accommodate for larger breasts. ARM SPACE: It has larger area for the arms, but with this dress, it seems you can adjust the straps plenty to accommodate for that. LENGTH: The XL Orange Dress is too big for me by a small amount, but that is especially shown in the length. The Large Blue Dress hits at my ankles. With the XL Orange Dress, I will need to either hem it or wear heels. It drags the floor when I am barefoot. I kind of like that look though. OTHER: The material is definitely not cotton, making it a little more formal, but I don't have to worry about wrinkles much. The slip inside is nice. If you were the type to want to show more leg, you could trim it below the butt and that would give a different sexy look. I'd be afraid I'd bend over and show too much - so not happening here. Someone replaced the buttons to make it look a little nicer. That might be worth the effort. I love this dress. I was going to keep one, but nope! Keeping them both. I'll try to remember to comment after I've worn them a while. Read more
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT DRESS FOR SO MANY OCCASIONS
items.body: This dress was absolutely perfect in every way! It was comfortable, size was right on, fit gave me a thinner look, length was perfect with 1 1/2 nude hills (Iâ€™m 5â€™1, 138 lb) beautiful color, light weight & not see through in the color I purchased & best of all itâ€™s ability to dress up or down. I wore this to my granddaughters wedding shower in August and now I use it to go for a casual day at the beach or a day/night out with friends wearing sandals. I loved the blue so much that I purchased the black one too! Read more
items.author: REF

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Laundry Drama Averted: The Secret to Keeping Your Cute Dress Stain-Free!
items.body: This dress is super cute, but let me give you some laundry wisdom: wash it on its own! Trust me on this one. Fill the washer with water and soap first, and then add the dress. If a single drop of detergent lands on it before the water, you'll end up with a permanent stain that looks like an oil spill. And believe me, it's not coming out. So, proceed with caution! I ordered two of these dresses, and after the first washing mishap, I learned my lesson. If you have a front-loading washer, make sure the detergent and fabric softener don't drip before the water is added. Other than that, the dress is flattering, and the cornflower color is so pretty. Just a heads upâ€”if you have big momma hips, you might want to size up unless you like it snug. The waist is a bit low. Happy wearing! Read more
items.author: b4komer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Deep Red, Grass Green, Black, Orange, Brick Red, Dark Apricot, Dark Rose Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Lake Blue, Navy, Wine Red, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
